TypeSignature.Value: public interface IQueryable<out T> : System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<out T>, System.Linq.IQueryable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IQueryable`1<+ T> implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Linq.IQueryable
Public Interface IQueryable(Of Out T) Implements IEnumerable(Of Out T), IQueryable
generic <typename T> public interface class IQueryable : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Linq::IQueryable
type IQueryable<'T> = interface interface seq<'T> interface IQueryable interface IEnumerable

span.span: The type of the data in the data source.

summary.span: 提供针对特定数据源（其中数据类型未未知）评估查询的功能。

span.span: Provides functionality to evaluate queries against a specific data source wherein the type of the data is known.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口仅供查询提供程序实现。The interface is intended for implementation by query providers. 此接口继承自接口，因此，如果它表示一个查询，可以枚举该查询的结果。This interface inherits the interface so that if it represents a query, the results of that query can be enumerated. 枚举强制与相关联的表达式树要执行对象。Enumeration forces the expression tree associated with an object to be executed. 执行不返回可枚举结果的查询时调用方法。Queries that do not return enumerable results are executed when the method is called. "执行表达式树"的定义是特定于查询提供程序。The definition of "executing an expression tree" is specific to a query provider. 例如，它可能涉及将转换为适用于基础数据源的查询语言的表达式树。For example, it may involve translating the expression tree to a query language appropriate for an underlying data source. 接口使查询能够为多形性。The interface enables queries to be polymorphic. 也就是说，因为针对查询`IQueryable`数据源表示为表达式树，它可以对不同类型的数据源执行。That is, because a query against an `IQueryable` data source is represented as an expression tree, it can be executed against different types of data sources. `static` (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 的类中定义的方法(除， ，和) 扩展实现的类型的对象接口。The `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) methods defined in the class (except for , , and ) extend objects of types that implement the interface. 有关如何创建自己的 LINQ 提供程序的详细信息，请参阅[LINQ： 生成 IQueryable 提供程序](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=112370)MSDN 博客上。For more information about how to create your own LINQ provider, see [LINQ: Building an IQueryable Provider](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=112370) on MSDN Blogs.
